! Overview

This plugin is an ''preview'' plugin, that should be implemented into the TW core in the future.

* You can open it using the [[$:/PaletteManager]] ... where the previews look a bit different as if you open it with the 
* $:/ControlPanel --> Appearence --> Palette -> <kbd>show editor</kbd> button

! Important

This plugin overwrites and adds the following system tiddlers:

|Shadow Tiddler |Reason to change it atm |h
|$:/PaletteManager |This is needed to get the new UI as shown in the image below |

|New |Description |h
|$:/PaletteManager/preview |Contains the whole preview code, which is `\import`ed to $:/PaletteManager |
|$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager/styles |Some specific adjustments needed - The goal is to implement most of them in vanilla/base |

The full list of plugin tiddlers can be seen at: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-manager -> content tab
